item.title: The first Novotel hotel has opened in Cambodia
item.description:
Source: Novotel Hotels, Suites & Resorts. The Novotel Phnom Penh BKK 1. Accor brand, Novotel Hotels, Suites & Resorts, has opened its newest location, the Novotel Phnom Penh BKK 1, in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. This brand-new hotel features a contemporary design, a welcoming social space, and diverse dining and wellness options. Its strategic location provides easy access to the bustling Bassac Lane and Langka Lane neighborhoods, as well as landmarks such as the Independence Monument and Wat Langka, one of the city’s oldest pagodas...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-first-novotel-hotel-has-opened-in-cambodia/
